title: Kate’s Lake
features: “An outstanding horror novel with heart-thumping action and a protagonist who walks a dangerous tightrope between his conscience and his vulnerabilities.”

Alcoholic war veteran, Mick Smith, discovers what he believes is the fountain of youth but soon learns the haunting truth about Kate’s Lake. Three years into sobriety, the untimely death of a fellow Marine sweeps Mick back into the sinful temptations he’s fought so hard to leave behind. Tormented by his hellish past, Mick must battle his own demons while seeking the truth about Kate’s Lake before it claims more innocent lives. The healing water in Kate’s Lake has gone bad and it’s not until Mick’s grisly discovery that his world truly unravels.
description: "An outstanding horror novel with heart-thumping action and a protagonist who walks a dangerous tightrope between his conscience and his vulnerabilities."

David Odle discovered his love for reading and writing at the age of thirteen. After seven-years in the military and over fourteen-years as an IT consultant living in Austin, Texas, he now resides in Indiana with his wife and five children. David is the author of the Urban Fantasy novel, Markus, and is currently working on his next novel.
